CustomField.formula: IF( OR( EOI_Status__c = "Published", EOI_Status__c = "Closed" ), "ðŸŸ¢ Published/Closed", IF( Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c < 15, "ðŸŸ¢ under 15 days", IF( AND( Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c >= 15, Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c < 30 ), "ðŸŸ under 30 days", IF( AND( Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c >= 30, Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c < 100 ), "ðŸ”´ under 100 days", IF( Days_Since_EOI_Status_Update__c >= 100, "ðŸ†˜ over 100 days", "" ) ) ) ) )
